name: waterHeatingMode_setValue
description: This function is used to set the boiler's hot water supply mode.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to set the hot water supply mode.

parameters.name: predefinedWaterHeatingMode
parameters.description: The predefined mode to set for the hot water supply (e.g., standard, rapid).
